Biography

Biography

HONORS: Academic All-WAC (2010)

2010 (JR): Played in 11 games, starting one game at safety against San Jose State... Finished the season with 16 tackles (nine solo, seven assists)... Posted a season-high four tackles in games against Idaho State and Hawai'i.

2009 (SO): Saw action in all 12 games... Posted 12 tackles (five solo, seven assists)... Tallied career-high six stops in Boise State game while adding two in San Jose State contest.

2008 (FR): Had 14 kickoff returns for 281 yards (20.1 ypr)... Season-long of 35-yards came in the Fresno State game, part of his season-high four returns for 93 yards outing.

HIGH SCHOOL: Rushed for 2,005 yards and 23 TD's with 479 receiving yards for another four TD's his senior season... Also had 361 combined return yards (207 kick, 154 punt)... Earned all-San Gabriel Valley League accolades as well as league MVP honors... Also a first-team all-CIF Southern section honoree... As a junior, he had 2,146 yards rushing on 267 carries with 19 TD's and had 11 catches for 91 yards... Was also a first-team all-league linebacker... Is the Duarte HS career rushing leader.

PERSONAL: Born June 1, 1990... Son of Chris and Theresa Harris... Has two brothers and one sister... Sister Shaton Harris played basketball at Sam Houston State... Majoring in interdisciplinary studies.
